display.title: WOMEN FEAR ME
description: &&3Fishing Rods&&r can cast a line into a body of water with &&7[&&r&&6Right-Click&&r&&7]&&r. Eventually, a line of bubbles will appear and the lure will be pulled down - &&7[&&r&&6Right-Click&&r&&7]&&r again to reel the catch in!
Catches include fish, junk, and, with a large enough pool - &&dtreasure&&r! including enchantments, nautilus shells, saddles, and name tags.
Fishing rods can also be used to &&d"yank" mobs&&r at a 5x durability cost.
Fishing rods can be &&3enchanted&&r to increase &&3durability&&r, increase &&dcatch speed&&r, and &&eimprove luck&&r.
&&7[FishingReal]&&r Fishing is &&3catch-and-release&&r. Given room, reeled-in fish will simply swim away.

&&7[DyableFishingLines]&&r You can &&ddye your fishing line&&r with any &&3dye&&r in the &&3crafting grid&&r. Rods can also be given special names (e.g. aro, pan, plural) for &&dspecial line colours&&r.
